name: automation-audit
description: This is an example of a Crawlee project.

scripts.assemble:workato: source .venv/bin/activate && csvs-to-sqlite storage/key_value_stores/workato/workato.csv audit.db -f name -f description -f templates
scripts.assemble:power-automate: source .venv/bin/activate && csvs-to-sqlite storage/key_value_stores/power-automate/power-automate.csv audit.db -f name -f description -f templates
scripts.publish: datasette publish vercel audit.db --project automation-audit --metadata metadata.json
scripts.test: echo "Error: oops, the actor has no tests yet, sad!" && exit 1

author: It's not you it's me
